Quick tip — Installing PyYAML for Jython

January 27, 2013

  • server
  • jython

PyYAML by default tries to create a C module against the libyaml library, and since Jython canâ€™t use C modules attempting to install PyYAML with Jython fails.

However, you can disable the C module install, like this:

~# wget http://pyyaml.org/download/pyyaml/PyYAML-3.09.tar.gz
~# tar zxf PyYAML-3.09.tar.gz
~# cd PyYAML-3.09
~# jython setup.py --without-libyaml install
